reference: [6] Walter, I., (1972): Nontariff Protection Among Industrial Countries: Some Preliminary Empirical Evidence, Economia Internazionale, 25, 335-54. `7Thus extending the compensation principle to international trade policy. It is worth discussing whether steps should be taken to ensure that compensation is effectively paid, so that the solution leads to a Pareto improvement at the country level. However, this goes far beyond the purpose of this paper. 24
